dsOverview.title: Line Island Experiment Aircraft Observations, 1967Mar-Apr

summary.p: The Line Islands Experiment of 1967 produced extensive data on disturbances in the equatorial trough zone. DSS has flight-level aircraft data from flights in February, March, and April 1967 that were flown in conjunction with the experiment.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
